definition: growth of hair or wool or fur covering the body of an animal, to cover or provide with a coat
details:
noun
- growth of hair or wool or fur covering the body of an animal
= synonyms: pelage
- an outer garment that has sleeves and covers the body from shoulder down
- a thin layer covering something
= example: a thin layer covering something
= synonyms: coating
verb
- to cover or provide with a coat
= example: to cover or provide with a coat
- to form a coat over
= example: to form a coat over
= synonyms: cake
- to put a coat on
= synonyms: surface
